base_description: Black laptop with rectangular shape and sleek design.
part_description: Contains a screen, keyboard, touchpad, and hinges. The screen is large and rectangular, positioned vertically. The keyboard is flat with multiple keys, situated below the screen. The touchpad is centrally located below the keyboard. Hinges connect the screen to the base.
internal_interaction_description: The screen is attached to the base via hinges, allowing it to open and close. The keyboard and touchpad are integrated into the base, enabling user input. The touchpad functions as a pointing device, while the keyboard allows text input. Internal circuitry connects these components for seamless operation.
external_interaction_description: The laptop interacts with users through the keyboard and touchpad for input. It displays output on the screen. External devices can connect via ports for additional functionality. It can be powered by an internal battery or an external power source through a charging port.
